com.adeptions.clarguments.validators

Class StringLengthValueValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adeptions.clarguments.validators.StringLengthValueValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentValueValidator<java.lang.String>

    public class StringLengthValueValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArgumentValueValidator<java.lang.String>
    Utility value validator for checking a string value is within length constraints (minimum and/or maximum)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringLengthValueValidator(java.lang.Integer minLength, java.lang.Integer maxLength)
      Constructs a StringLengthValueValidator with the specified minimum and maximum length values

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringLengthValueValidator

        public StringLengthValueValidator(java.lang.Integer minLength,
                                  java.lang.Integer maxLength)
        Constructs a StringLengthValueValidator with the specified minimum and maximum length values
        Parameters:
        minLength - the minimum length of the string (null for no minimum enforced)
        maxLength - the maximum length of the string (null for no maximum enforced)

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public java.lang.String validate(int tokenPosition,
                                 java.lang.String value,
                                 Argument argument,
                                 ArgName specifiedArgName)
                          throws BadArgException
        Validates the value
        Specified by:
        validate in interface ArgumentValueValidator<java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        tokenPosition - the position of the token (in original args[])
        value - the value to be validated
        argument - the argument for which the value was found
        specifiedArgName - the name by which the argument was specified
        Returns:
        the validated value (normally the same as was passed in)
        Throws:
        BadArgException - if the validation fails
